data.title: Official Site of Author Robert Ford
data.meta_description: This is the website of Robert Ford, author of the novels The Compound, Samson and Denial, Bordertown, The Last Firefly of Summer, and the Ring of Fire. He has co-authored the novels A Penny For Your Thoughts with Matt Hayward, and Rattlesnake Kisses with John Boden. He also has a collection of his short fiction, The God Beneath My Garden.
